reviewText: Would not play in my Blue Ray Player, because got an error code that it was not compatible.  Bought another 'international' blue ray player, and it still would not play.  Went to Italy on vacation, and brought it with me, and still would not play on machine in Italy!  If I could give it zero stars, I would.  Total waste of money.

I purchased this for a class project.  What I did not know at the time...is that European DVD's are recorded at a different speed than those in the USA.  We were able to find a player that could read both the USA and European DVD's.

It is a cute and entertaining story...but...WITHOUT...English Sub-Titles.
There are no English subtitles! The DVD wouldn't work anywhere except the laptop. Very disappointed.
What a fun movie.  Very well done and full of energy.  Ornella Muti is just gorgeously beautiful.  Could not take my eyes off her!!!

I've been wanting to get this movie for almost 30 years and thanks to Amazon I finally got it. :)
The only issue is that I can only play it on my computer as is not compatible with DVD or Blue Ray
Does not work an my DVD, I do not think that it is made to work in tha United States system,do you have a solution?

There was no indication on the Amazon page that this is a Russian overdub of an Italian comedy classic.

Hence a birthday present to my Auntie turned out to be an unexpected dissapointment.

Correspondence with the (seller) was also one of the most dismal experiences in my ten years of purchasing
great products through Amazon.
